name: A review of Daily Dadish by Bobby Jack

itemReviewed.name: A review of Daily Dadish by Bobby Jack

words: a dadish a day is not quite the same. daily dadish has many things going for it, but this radish needs a bit more seasoning.
on nintendo switch for just under

. a decent chunk of this time was spent backtracking and in the lair, but the game has so much to occupy you with, especially if you go all-in on the 100% challenge, that it’s easy to soak up time in its world.
